patterns: What are the chances of injury or death
What are the chances of getting hurt
What is the likelihood of something bad happening
responses: Our rockets were designed by professionals with safety in mind and no one has been seriously injured on any of our over 10,000 rocket flights. For more information about safety, visit our Safety page.
Our flights are very safe. You are nearly 100 times more likely to die in an hour of driving than in an hour on one of our flights. For more information about safety, visit our Safety page.
I apologize if I did something wrong. To submit a complaint, please contact us.
You're welcome! Thanks for choosing Nibiru!
No problem! Thank you for choosing to fly with Nibiru!
It's my pleasure to help. Have a great day!
